thread.title: Rhonda Rose Scott
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Rhonda Rose Scott

author: Rhonda Rose Scott
title: Rhonda Rose Scott
text: Don't care for the intense sales people...would make me walk out of store, but Mo is just a decent human being who enjoys families and I would buy from him again. This is the 2nd time I've bought from Mo. it's people like him that make your store. Thanks Mo!
